participant_1.name: Rajesh
participant_1.personality: Energetic and passionate about sports, Rajesh loves to encourage others and share his knowledge of swimming.
participant_1.background: my family and i are from india. i am a swim coach at my local pool. my favorite music genre is death metal. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Sofia is nurturing and creative, always excited to inspire her students and create a warm learning environment.
participant_2.background: my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week. i'm an elementary school teacher. my favorite colors are red and silver. i'm fluent in english, spanish, and french.

content.text: hey how are you doing tonight? i am good.
i just got home from the pool. i'm a swim coach.
